mapper.select: select lec.subj_no as sub, sub.type as type, count(*) as count from lecture lec inner join subject sub on lec.subj_no=sub.subj_no group by lec.subj_no order by lec.type
select lec.lect_no, lec.subject_id, r.rate, r.content from lecture lec inner join subject sub on lec.subj_no=sub.subj_no where subj_no=#{subjectNo}
select r.review_no, r.student_id, t.name, r.subject_id, r.rate, r.content from review r inner join student t on r.student_id=t.student_no where review_no=#{reviewNo}
